line_1: Tho' I should pawn my pleugh an' graith,
line_2: Then up I gat, an swoor an aith,

line_1: Tho' I should pawn my pleugh an' graith,
line_2: Or die a cadger pownie's death,

line_1: Tho' I should pawn my pleugh an' graith,
line_2: A pint an' gill I'd gie them baith,

line_1: An' Ploughmen gather wi' their graith,
line_2: When Vulcan gies his bellys breath,

line_1: An' Ploughmen gather wi' their graith,
line_2: O rare! to see thee fizz an' freath

line_1: An' Ploughmen gather wi' their graith,
line_2: Then Burnewin comes on like Death

line_1: Here, farmers gash, in ridin graith,
line_2: There, swankies young, in braw braid-claith,
